story_cover.title: The Enchanted Garden
story_cover.description: A magical fairy tale adventure where a young gardener discovers a mysterious enchanted garden with talking animals, magical flowers, and ancient secrets waiting to be uncovered.

page_one.title: The Mysterious Garden Gate
page_one.description: While walking through the forest, you discover an ornate golden gate covered in glowing vines. Through the bars, you see the most beautiful garden you've ever imagined. A small silver key hangs from a nearby branch. What do you do?

page_two.title: The Singing Bluebird's Path
page_two.description: You follow the melodious bluebird deeper into the garden. It leads you to a shimmering pond where three magical lily pads float...

page_three.title: The Wise Rabbit''s Riddle
page_three.description: The white rabbit adjusts his tiny spectacles and says, "Welcome, young one! I am the keeper of garden secrets..."

page_four.title: The Garden of Golden Blooms
page_four.description: You approach the golden flowers, and they begin to chime like bells in the wind. Suddenly, a tiny fairy appears...

page_five.title: The Ancient Memory Tree
page_five.description: As you touch the massive oak tree, visions flood your mind...

page_six.title: The Pool of Reflection
page_six.description: Stepping on the sapphire lily pad, you sink gently into the crystal-clear water...

page_seven.title: The Grove of Growing Things
page_seven.description: The emerald lily pad transports you to a grove where everything grows at incredible speed...

page_eight.title: The Chamber of Brave Hearts
page_eight.description: The ruby lily pad brings you to a grand chamber filled with the armor and weapons of ancient heroes...

page_nine.title: Guardian of the Enchanted Garden
page_nine.description: You choose to become the garden''s new guardian...

page_ten.title: The Great Healer
page_ten.description: You dedicate your life to healing the earth's wounded places...

page_eleven.title: Champion of Justice
page_eleven.description: Armed with courage and the blessing of the phoenix, you return to the world as a protector...

page_one.choice_text_one: Use the silver key to unlock the gate
page_one.choice_text_two: Call out to see if anyone is inside

page_two.choice_text_one: Step on the sapphire lily pad
page_two.choice_text_two: Step on the emerald lily pad
page_two.choice_text_three: Step on the ruby lily pad
